short_summary: Miscellaneous requirement for Cleaning Compound, Solvent-Detergent to National Defence
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.  The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia. Item 1, GSIN: 7930, NSN: 99-524-9993, CLEANING COMPOUND,SOLVENT-DETERGENT Part No.: 2345, NCAGE: K8990, ALTAIR (UK) LTD Quantity: 2,375, Unit of Issue: Liters, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia. Item 2, GSIN: 7930, NSN: 99-524-9993, , CLEANING COMPOUND,SOLVENT-DETERGENT Part No.: 2345, NCAGE: K8990, ALTAIR (UK) LTD Quantity: 1,250, Unit of Issue: Liters, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia. Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering. Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected. The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods and/or services. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
tags: Disinfecting or presterilization cleaning equipment and solutions
full_summary:
## Notice of Proposed Procurement

The Department of National Defence Canada invites bidders to submit a Proposal for the procurement of Cleaning Compound, Solvent-Detergent. The delivery of the requested items will be made at two locations:

* CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-4900-60384600
* **Solicitation Number**: W8482-229495/C
* **Publication Date**: 2023-04-20
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-05-19T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-05-19
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2023-05-20

### Required Items

* **Item 1**: Cleaning Compound, Solvent-Detergent, NSN: 99-524-9993, Quantity: 2,375 units
	+ Unit of Issue: Liters
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* **Item 2**: Cleaning Compound, Solvent-Detergent, NSN: 99-524-9993, Quantity: 1,250 units
	+ Unit of Issue: Liters
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

### Bidder Information

* **Language**: Documents may be submitted in either English or French.
* **Currency**: Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
* **Trade Agreements**: The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).
* **Preferential Treatment**: A preference for Canadian goods and/or services is given to this procurement.

### Proposal Submission

Bidders are required to submit a Proposal, including a detailed price quotation, in accordance with the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents available through the Government of Canada's tendering website.

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact Katharine Barker at (819) 939-4337 or by email at Katharine.Barker2@forces.gc.ca.

### Documents

The RFP documents and related attachments are available for download at the following links:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4900/amendment-001-w8482-229495-c_0.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform
